title: Capital Assured Partners with One Sothebys International Realty to Offer Stunning New Luxury Ritz-Carlton Residences in Miami
text:
(MENAFN Press) DUBAI, UAE, August 17, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --

Real estate investment, management and development firm Capital Assured is pleased to announce that it has signed an agreement with One Sotheby's International Realty to bring Ritz-Carlton's new, ultra-luxury Residences in Miami Beach, Florida, exclusively to buyers in the Middle East.

(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150805/255642LOGO )
The partnership further cements Capital Assured's reputation for building strong, income-generating relationships and bringing high-quality investment opportunities to the Middle East. One Sotheby's Executive Vice President, Fernando de Nunez y Lugones comments on the agreement: "We are excited to enter into this partnership with such an established player and look forward to working collaboratively together to create further value from this relationship. Working with Capital Assured allows us to use their impressive track record and gain global access to an audience of investors."

Nicholas Turner, CEO, Capital Assured Miami, says: "We're honored to work in cooperation with Sotheby's to introduce investors to this incredibly exciting development."

The Ritz-Carlton Residences have been designed by world-renowned architect and designer Piero Lissoni and are comprised of 111 stunning condominiums and 15 expansive family villas. Set in seven acres of lush tropical gardens and looking out over an ocean water enclave, the development brings exceptional modern design and resort-style amenities together with unmatched views of Miami Beach, Biscayne Bay and downtown Miami.

This opportunity to invest in US real estate comes at an ideal time for investors in the Middle East, as oil prices weaken and more established property markets such as London show signs of peaking. Capital Assured has been instrumental in helping MENA investors to diversify their portfolios, and as part of this can now offer the Ritz-Carlton Residences, the perfect opportunity for lifestyle investors. Robin Titus, General Manager of Capital Assured Dubai comments: "We are very excited to be investing in a rare offering, unmatched in south Florida. Scheduled to open late 2016, there is already huge demand from the Middle East, as these properties will be exclusively focused on the rich taste of the Arabian Peninsula."

About Capital Assured: 

Capital Assured is driven by the desire to provide 'Wealth Protection and Income Generation' for future generations. This is accomplished through Real-Estate Investment, Management and Development. Capital Assured is headquartered in Miami, USA with offices in Dubai, UAE; Buenos Aires, Argentina & London, U.K.

Capital Assured was initially founded as a vehicle to help the existing shareholders to invest and manage real estate in the USA. Since inception, the business model has been adjusted in order to assist other high net worth individuals and institutions to invest and to manage income-generating property, primarily in the United States of America.

For more information, please contact Anna Platova, Wealth Manager and Investment Consultant, on 9714-3789002 or via Anna@capitalassured.com.
